<amp-story-page id="cover"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/entretenimento/25/2019/06/25/quase-100-das-brasileiras-ja-passaram-por-alguma-forma-de-assedio-no-transporte-coletivo-indica-pesquisa-do-instituto-lomocotiva-1561491086088_v2_450x800.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset layer-text text-light with-shadow"><div class="grid-first valign-top content-center">   <div class="wrap-logo  bottom"><div class="logo"><amp-img width="165" height="52" layout="flex-item" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/ampstories/logos/ecoa-light.png"></amp-img></div></div>   </div><div class="grid-second valign-middle"></div><div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-center"><div class="heading with-shadow">  <div class="wrap-label animate-top"><span class="label">Como fazer</span></div>   <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Saiba como denunciar casos de assédio sexual no transporte coletivo de SP</span></h1>   </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third  valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"><span class="author"></span></div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>  </amp-story-page>   <amp-story-page id="page0" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="bg-dark">    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds bg-dark layer-text title-text   text-light">  <div class="grid-second valign-middle text-center ">  <div class="text animate-top">O transporte público de SP é considerado o ambiente para maior risco de assédio sexual. Essa é a opinião de quase metade (44%) das entrevistadas que participaram de uma pesquisa realizada pelo Ibope Inteligência em parceria com a Rede Nossa São Paulo no início do ano.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author"></span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page1" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/esporte/73/2017/07/06/passageiros-lotam-plataforma-da-estacao-se-da-linha-3-vermelha-do-metro-de-sao-paulo-no-sentido-corinthians-itaquera-1499388168770_450x800.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">  <div class="grid-first overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   text-light">  <div class="grid-first valign-top text-center ">  <div class="text animate-top">Para elas, o metrô, os ônibus e os vagões de trem são ainda mais perigosos do que as ruas da cidade. Uma das formas de coibir o problema é denunciar as agressões. A seguir, veja como fazer isso em cada um dos transportes.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Rogerio Cavalheiro/Futura Press/Estadão Conteúdo</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page2" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="bg-dark">    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds bg-dark layer-text title-numeral   text-light">  <div class="grid-second valign-middle text-left ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Metrô</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">Nas linhas 1-Azul, 2-Verde, 3-Vermelha, 15-Prata, a denúncia pode ser feita de três maneiras:</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author"></span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page3" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/noticias/d9/2017/11/24/31jul2015---mulher-espera-metro-na-estacao-vila-madalena-em-sao-paulo-1511524466745_v2_450x800.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">  <div class="grid-first overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   text-light">  <div class="grid-first valign-top text-left ">  <div class="text animate-top">Chamando um segurança ou qualquer outro funcionário do Metrô que esteja por perto. Eles devem ajudar a dar início ao processo de identificação dos suspeitos, além de prestar auxílio ao registro da denúncia na Delpom (Delegacia de Polícia do Metropolitano).</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Fabio Braga/Folhapress</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page4" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/noticias/eb/2018/10/24/celular-mensagens-bate-papo-sms-1540415583229_v2_450x800.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">  <div class="grid-third overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   text-light">  <div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-left ">  <div class="text animate-top">Enviando uma mensagem para o SMS-Denúncia (97333-2252) informando o local da ocorrência e a descrição do agressor, para que os agentes mais próximos possam ir até a vítima.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Getty Images/iStockphoto</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page5" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/entretenimento/b3/2019/11/01/metro-conecta-1572587634444_v2_450x800.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">  <div class="grid-second overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   text-light">  <div class="grid-second valign-middle text-center ">  <div class="text animate-top">Pelo aplicativo Metrô Conecta, canal de comunicação entre os usuários e a administração do Metrô. O ideal é ter o app já disponível no celular, pois o procedimento requer alguns passos:</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Reprodução/Metro Conecta</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page6" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="bg-dark">    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds bg-dark layer-text list   text-light">  <div class="grid-second valign-middle text-center ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Aplicativo Metrô Conecta</span></h1>     <ul class="notOrdered">  <li class="text animate-top">Primeiro é preciso fazer um cadastro com número de telefone e e-mail</li>  <li class="text animate-top">Uma senha será enviada para validação</li>  <li class="text animate-top">Surgirá, então, uma tela de apresentação. Clique em “ Início” e, então, selecione “abuso sexual” entre as opções de denúncia.Quando a ocorrência for durante a viagem, será preciso informar a linha em que ocorreu o assédio (Linha 1 - Azul, por exemplo) e o número do vagão</li>  <ul>   </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author"></span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page7" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="bg-dark">    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds bg-dark layer-text list   text-light">  <div class="grid-second valign-middle text-center ">     <ul class="notOrdered">  <li class="text animate-top">Para assédios ocorridos na plataforma, selecione a estação (Jabaquara, por exemplo). Ainda no app, é possível escrever detalhes do ocorrido e enviar fotos do suspeito e da localização</li>  <li class="text animate-top">A mensagem é recebida no Centro de Controle de Segurança, que destaca os agentes mais próximos da ocorrência para verificação</li>  <ul>   </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author"></span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page8" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="bg-dark">    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds bg-dark layer-text title-numeral   text-light">  <div class="grid-second valign-middle text-left ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Linha 4-Amarela</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">A concessionária ViaQuatro, responsável pela operação e manutenção da Linha 4 - Amarela do Metrô de São Paulo, orienta procurar um agente de atendimento e segurança imediatamente.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author"></span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page9" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/noticias/3d/2019/02/07/trens-da-linha-4-amarela-do-metro-de-sao-paulo-foram-os-primeiros-a-operar-sem-condutor-1549541623475_v2_450x800.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">  <div class="grid-first overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   text-light">  <div class="grid-first valign-top text-left ">  <div class="text animate-top">Caso a vítima esteja dentro de um trem e não localize um funcionário, ela poderá acionar o botão intercomunicador, localizado próximo à porta dos trens, para falar com um atendente.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Diego Padgurschi/Folhapress</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page10" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/entretenimento/55/2019/11/01/botao-linha-amarela-1572629776456_v2_450x800.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">  <div class="grid-third overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   text-light">  <div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-left ">  <div class="text animate-top">Após apertar o botão, o atendimento ocorrerá na estação seguinte. No total, são oito botões por vagão e 48 por trem.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Reprodução/ViaQuatro</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page11" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="bg-dark">    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds bg-dark layer-text title-text   text-light">  <div class="grid-second valign-middle text-center ">  <div class="text animate-top">A concessionária informa ainda que todos os agentes de atendimento e segurança estão capacitados para acolher a vítima, prestar primeiros socorros e, se necessário, oferecer acompanhamento à 1ª Delegacia de Defesa da Mulher, no centro da cidade.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author"></span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page12" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="bg-dark">    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds bg-dark layer-text title-numeral   text-light">  <div class="grid-second valign-middle text-left ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Trem</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">A orientação da CPTM (Companhia Paulista de Trens Metropolitanos) é: ao sofrer ou presenciar um abuso sexual nos trens ou estações, a vítima deve informar imediatamente o funcionário mais próximo.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author"></span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page13" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/noticias/c7/2018/10/16/o-trem-que-ligara-a-estacao-da-luz-no-centro-de-sao-paulo-ao-aeroporto-internacional-de-sao-paulo-em-cumbica-guarulhos-comeca-a-operar-nesta-terca-feira-17-o-servico-havia-sido-prometido-para-1539705617279_v2_450x800.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">  <div class="grid-first overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   text-light">  <div class="grid-first valign-top text-left ">  <div class="text animate-top">Os usuários podem ainda acionar a Companhia por meio do serviço SMS-Denúncia (97150-4949) informando na mensagem o local da ocorrência e as características do suspeito.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">NELSON ANTOINE/ESTADÃO CONTEÚDO</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page14" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="bg-dark">    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds bg-dark layer-text title-text   text-light">  <div class="grid-second valign-middle text-center ">  <div class="text animate-top">A CPTM ressalta ainda que, caso seja identificado o suspeito do assédio, ele será conduzido à delegacia de polícia mais próxima para o registro do Boletim de Ocorrência</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author"></span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page15" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="bg-dark">    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds bg-dark layer-text title-numeral   text-light">  <div class="grid-second valign-middle text-left ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Ônibus municipal</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">Em caso de assédio sexual em ônibus municipais (SPTrans), a primeira atitude é avisar o motorista ou o cobrador.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author"></span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page16" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/noticias/2015/05/11/11mai2015---o-sindmotoristas-sindicato-dos-motoristas-e-trabalhadores-em-transporte-rodoviario-urbano-de-sao-paulo-informou-que-fara-nesta-terca-feira-12-uma-paralisacao-de-duas-horas-na-capital-1431378950114_450x800.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">  <div class="grid-third overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   text-light">  <div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-left ">  <div class="text animate-top">Os funcionários estão orientados pela SPTrans a parar o coletivo e aguardar a chegada da polícia ou, então, a conduzir a vítima até a delegacia mais próxima, para registro de boletim de ocorrência.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Carla Daniel/Frame/Estadão Conteúdo</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page17" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="bg-dark">    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds bg-dark layer-text title-numeral   text-light">  <div class="grid-second valign-middle text-left ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Ônibus intermunicipal</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">A vítima ou a testemunha deve procurar um funcionário das concessionárias e permissionárias responsáveis pela operação dos ônibus da EMTU. Pode ser o motorista ou um dos encarregados por organizar o fluxo dos veículos, que ficam no terminal.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author"></span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page18" class="text-light"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/noticias/2013/09/21/21set2013---comecou-a-circular-na-noite-dessa-sexta-feira-20-a-linha-de-onibus-24h-apelidados-de-corujao-da-emtu-empresa-metropolitana-de-transportes-urbanos-de-sao-paulo-que-circularao-nas-1379773055696_450x800.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset">  <div class="grid-first overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   text-light">  <div class="grid-first valign-top text-left ">  <div class="text animate-top">De acordo com a EMTU (Empresa Metropolitana de Transporte Urbano), eles estão orientados a denunciar o criminoso pelo telefone 190 do Centro de Operações da Polícia Militar.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Edison Temoteo/Futura Press/Estadão Conteúdo</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page> title: App, SMS e mais | Saiba como denunciar  assédio no transporte  público de São Paulo
